Attractions

The Langham, Gold Coast and Jewel Residences are home to many of the hottest and best attractions that are the very first of their kind, offering guests an exciting world of entertainment and cultural heritage.

Top Pokies Room

The Top Pokies Room at this Australian hotel is where you'll find the hottest, best, and first-time games. Our room offers an exciting gambling experience, providing guests with access to the most popular and original slots.

The games presented in Pokies Room are true leaders in their class. They offer unique games, a sense of excitement and the opportunity to win big prizes. The very first and most interesting games are found in this room, making it a desirable place for guests who want to try their luck.
